description:

description:

description:

description:
A number of open-source tech tools have moved towards commercial licences. Thoughtworks says this creates “big headaches” for IT, which is scrambling to maintain compliance and find replacement tools.

The post Some Open-Source Software Licences Are Only ‘Open-ish,’ Says Thoughtworks appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Some Open-Source Software Licences Are Only ‘Open-ish,’ Says Thoughtworks

description:
CockroachDB is a highly resilient and scalable distributed SQL database designed to handle large-scale data workloads easily. In this guide, we’ll show you how to install the CockroachDB cluster on Ubuntu 24.04 servers.

The post How to Install CockroachDB Cluster on Ubuntu 24.04 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install CockroachDB Cluster on Ubuntu 24.04

description:
